

                     = StatusBar Component =

== Overview ==

The StatusBar component controls the app's status bar, the zone,
typically at the top of the screen, that displays the current time,
WiFi and cellular network info, battery level, and/or other status
icons.


== Props ==

The most critical props for the status bar are

1. barStyle [StatusBarStyle] - Sets the color of the status bar text

    b) StatusBarStyle [enum] - Status bar style type

       | Value           | Type   | Description                            |
       |-----------------|--------|----------------------------------------|
       | 'default'       | string | Default status bar style               |
       | 'light-content' | string | Dark background, white texts and icons |
       | 'dark-content'  | string | Light background, dark texts and icons |

2. animated [boolean] - If the transition between status bar property changes should be animated. Supported for "backgroundColor", "barStyle", and "hidden" properties


{{https://reactnative.dev/docs/statusbar|React Native Docs: StatusBar}}
